EmailTemplate.name: Case Emails For Non-Members -JP-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: 【We have received your inquiry】from DAZN - {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your interest in DAZN.
We've received your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber} from {!Contact.Email}.
A member of our Customer Support team will be in touch within 24 hours regarding your inquiry. In the meantime, you may find some helpful information from our help page (https://my.dazn.com/Help).
Thank you for your patience.
Privacy Policy https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/privacy
Terms of Use https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
